description: We’re always ready to answer your questions. Book a consultation — we’ll gladly help optimize your business!

faq.question: Do you help with domain and hosting?
faq.answer: Yes, we choose the best SEO-friendly domain and reliable hosting with high uptime, configure SSL certificates and CDN for faster and secure site loading.

faq.question: Can I order a multilingual website?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We implement multilingual solutions with proper content localization, hreflang tag generation for SEO, and smooth language switching.

faq.question: Which technologies do you use?
faq.answer: We use a modern tech stack — HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Next.js (SSR/SSG), and Node.js — to ensure speed, scalability, and SEO-friendliness.

faq.question: How do you test the website before launch?
faq.answer: We run functionality, responsiveness, speed, SEO, and security tests to ensure a stable and optimized production release.
